segments.text: Hello , may I make an appointment for sometime early this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . All the appointments are filled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , what a pity . I'd like to see the doctor as soon as possible . I have a sharp pain in my chest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see ... Perhaps I could fit you in at five thirty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Five thirty ? I have a dinner appointment at six .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I can't wait . I feel awful . The dinner appointment has to be canceled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess it can't be helped .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right . Did you say 5:30 ? I'll make a note of it . Fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , then . See you this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1
